outfit_data.top: A crisp white cotton voile blouse with a relaxed, empire waist silhouette and three-quarter length sleeves.
outfit_data.bottom: Charcoal gray linen wide-leg trousers with a high waist and pleats at the front for added movement.
outfit_data.shoes: Simple black leather ballet flats with a pointed toe.
outfit_data.extras: A delicate silver chain necklace and small ivory clutch bag.
